name: Titan Souls Demo: Prototype Redux
description:
A re-creation of the original jam prototype made for Ludum Dare 28 in the new Titan Souls engine and world.

We've re-created the original jam map and included the original 3 Titan fights from the jam game in their current form, which acts as a demo for the full game!

The full version of Titan Souls will be available on 14th April for Windows, Mac OSX, PS4 and PSVita. You can pre-order on Steam: http://store.steampowered.com/app/297130/
